message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $250.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe the product's value to me doesn't justify such a high price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $180.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand your perspective, but I think the product's value is higher than that. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm going to counteroffer at $220.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $200.
Thanks for your latest offer, Bob! I'm still not convinced that $200 is enough. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a decent profit. I'm going to counteroffer at $210.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my assessment, I would like to counteroffer at $195.

I understand your persistence, Bob! However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm going to counteroffer at $205.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. Considering the product's value to me, I would like to counteroffer at $198.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm starting to get a bit frustrated. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $210. I'm going to counteroffer at $208.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counteroffer at $199.
